# rangeen

`pip install rangeen`

## Usage:

`
from rangeen import emotes
from rangeen import warning
from rangeen import colors, colorify

print(f"{emotes.heart} from India!")
print(warning("this is a warning"))
print(colorify("THIS IS A SAMPLE", fg=colors.WHITE, bg=colors.BLUE))
`
